text: Anders Wilgotson (born 30 September 1950) is a Swedish rower. He competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Sweden Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Anders Wilgotson
